title: South-bound train service disruption due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 南行列车服务因轨道故障而中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan kereta arah selatan akibat kerosakan landasan
title_translations.ta: தடக் கோளாறு காரணமாக தெற்கு நோக்கிச் செல்லும் ரயில் சேவை தடைபட்டது

updates.text: UPDATE:South-bound train service from Somerset towards Marina Bay running well again.
South-bound train service from Somerset towards Marina Bay moving slower due to track fault.
UPDATE:South-bound train service from Braddell to Toa Payoh running well again.
